featured.text: In 1931, members of the Rotary Clubs of Alberta and Montana suggested joining the two parks as a symbol of peace and friendship between the two countries.
What made it necessary to build a road through the Glacier National Park? (A) There were too many parks in Montana.

definition.zh_def: 美國的一個州，位於西北部，以其自然風光和野生動物著稱。
definition.en_def: A state in the northwestern United States known for its natural beauty and wildlife.
definition.example: Montana is famous for its stunning national parks and vast landscapes.
